/.title: UI Works – Mini Frontend Challenges
/.description: A collection of interactive React mini-challenges: clocks, games, carousels, sliders, and more. Practice and showcase your frontend skills!

/clock.title: Analog Clock – UI Works
/clock.description: A real-time analog clock with moving hands and hour markers.

/board.title: Board of Boredom – UI Works
/board.description: A simple board game with dice rolling and win conditions.

/pagination.title: Geo Deck – UI Works
/pagination.description: Paginated country cards fetched from a public API.

/websocket.title: WebSocket Demo – UI Works
/websocket.description: Real-time WebSocket client with auto-reconnect and notifications.

/calendar.title: Calendar – UI Works
/calendar.description: Monthly calendar with navigation and correct leap year handling.

/carousel.title: Image Carousel – UI Works
/carousel.description: Interactive carousel with auto-play, keyboard navigation, and thumbnails.

/guess-my-age.title: Guess My Age – UI Works
/guess-my-age.description: Predict age from a name using an external API.
